title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. The coefficients of y are already opposite.

title: Solve for x
text: y will be eliminated and then solve for x. \\n $$-6x=12$$ \\n $$x=-2$$

title: Substitute and Solve for y
text: Substitute $$x=-2$$ into one of the original equations and solve for y. \\n $$-7x+6y=-10$$ \\n $$-7\left(-2\right)+6y=-10$$ \\n $$14+6y=-10$$ \\n $$y=-4$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (-2,-4).
